overview: Streamline an existing manual process of spatializing BL data, empowering departments to use the spatialized data set in future projects. Then use the newly spatialized BL data to build an interactive visualization and analysis tool as a web map.

solutions.description: mapped out current systems and determined how i can use them to get what i need to be done.

challenges.description: Limited Time, only 2 weeks for coding

solutions.description: Had stages in the project, had a base stage that had what was needed, then if i finished it had more features to add if there was time.
Even when we werent in the coding stages of the project, i was practicing coding. Mapping out how it exactly needed to be done left little room for confusion

outcome: Achieved a 90% increase in geolocation accuracy by developing a REST API tool, using C#, that extracted data and conducted forward geolocation. This enhancement facilitated precise mapping for over 5,000 user-entered business addresses and significantly expanded the scope of spatialization.Enhanced user experience through the development of an intuitive query interface and dynamic visualization of data, utilizing the power of the API tool.

overview: Utilized player statistics and salaries from the 2022 season to explore the correlation between salary and skill. Additionally, developed a compelling use case for further performance analysis of players.
note: This project is soley based on the 2022 season, I would like to expand this in the future to use contious data. I would also like to code the case study.
impact: Helps mlb managers make player decisions

overview: Redesigned Admin page of Reading Room to be more intuitive and user friendly.
